nodes.text: Pyther was Human male member of the Balmorran resistance during the Cold War. His mother and father both died when the Galactic Republic abandoned the planet and led the Empire take over, prompting him to join the resistance cell led by Gray Star. By 3643 BBY he was part of the group led by Chemish Or, which cooperated with the Eagle's network.
Pyther is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Nolan North.
